Package org.neo4j.test

Class Race

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.test.Race
  • public class Race
extends Object
    Simple race scenario, a utility for executing multiple threads coordinated to start at the same time. Add contestants with addContestant(Runnable) and then when all have been added, start them simultaneously using go(), which will block until all contestants have completed. Any errors from contestants are propagated out from go().

      • withEndCondition

        public Race withEndCondition​(BooleanSupplier... endConditions)
        Adds an end condition to this race. The race will end whenever an end condition is met or when there's one contestant failing (throwing any sort of exception).
        Parameters:
        endConditions - one or more end conditions, such that when returning true signals that the race should end.
        Returns:
        this Race instance.

      • withMaxDuration

        public Race withMaxDuration​(long time,
                            TimeUnit unit)
        Convenience for adding an end condition which is based on time. This will have contestants end after the given duration (time + unit).
        Parameters:
        time - time value.
        unit - unit of time in TimeUnit.
        Returns:
        this Race instance.

      • mergeEndCondition

        private BooleanSupplier mergeEndCondition​(BooleanSupplier additionalEndCondition)

      • throwing

        public static Runnable throwing​(Race.ThrowingRunnable runnable)
        Convenience for wrapping contestants, especially for lambdas, which throws any sort of checked exception.
        Parameters:
        runnable - actual contestant.
        Returns:
        contestant wrapped in a try-catch (and re-throw as unchecked exception).

      • goAsync

        public void goAsync()
             throws Throwable
        Starts the race and returns without waiting for contestants to complete. Any exception thrown by contestant will be lost.
        Throws:
        Throwable

      • go

        public void go()
        throws Throwable
        Starts the race and waits indefinitely for all contestants to either fail or succeed.
        Throws:
        Throwable - on any exception thrown from any contestant.

      • goUnchecked

        public void goUnchecked()
        Like go, but wraps any exception in RuntimeException.

      • go

        public void go​(long maxWaitTime,
               TimeUnit unit)
        throws Throwable
        Starts the race and waits maxWaitTime for all contestants to either fail or succeed.
        Parameters:
        maxWaitTime - max time to wait for all contestants, 0 means indefinite wait.
        unit - TimeUnit that {Â£maxWaitTime is given in.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - if all contestants haven't either succeeded or failed within the given time.
        Throwable - on any exception thrown from any contestant.
